topic.title: Zeroverse
topic.body: Am I the only that can't get verification on zeroverse ?

1_1Mxv7my8HRBiVNRtiFaHrrbb11hmPqa6qL.body:
> [erneraude](#comment_7_1JwPBvZYXLJzrA6YisjpsyTuuieFLCARS6): It worked correctly with me.What is your problem exactly ?

BitMessage can't get the encryption key.

> [ks](#comment_158_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): Zeroverse is run by Erkan. He hasn't been seen for quite a few weeks, AFAIK. I'm unsure whether the bitmessage interaction is set up to be fully automatic.

Oh ok thanks I think it was run by him or he has to have bitmessage open on his computer because the message won't send.
